subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Eric Devendorf and Andy Rautins both made three 3-pointers in a six-minute span to fuel a stirring first-half surge , and No. 13 Syracuse beat visiting Seton Hall.
snippet: Eric Devendorf and Andy Rautins both made three 3-pointers in a six-minute span to fuel a stirring first-half surge , and No. 13 Syracuse beat visiting Seton Hall.
